name: Greenfoot Archive
summary: Learn about .GFAR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Downloading a GFAR file from the Greenfoot site:
Download a Scenario from the Scenarios section on the Greenfoot site (If the user made the scenario open, there should be an Open in Greenfoot button).
Open the Greenfoot application, select Scenario â†’ Open... in the menu bar.
Select your GFAR file and open it.

description: Archive associated with Greenfoot, a Java development environment; proprietary format of a .JAR archive; similar to a .GREENFOOT file but contains game and simulation scenarios that can be downloaded from the Greenfoot site.
